questions.question: Focus on the Community Group channel to examine how its GMV is distributed across all business categories.

answer.value: The Community Group channel has a diversified GMV distribution, unlike the more concentrated patterns of other channels.

key_insights: The Community Group channel distributes its GMV relatively evenly across all four business categories, rather than concentrating on one.

reasoning.reasoning: Focusing on the Community Group channel simplifies the visual by removing other acquisition sources, making it easier to analyze its distribution.
